fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Cause a player to spin-fade out of existence

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your target will be sent the gif attached
-Your target will seem to no longer exist. They will be removed from the player list, their messages will be deleted, and no role or will shall be shown. This ability bypasses removal immunity
-Anyone visiting your target will have their ability fail, and they will also have the gif sent to them and spin-fade out of existence
-Investigative roles visiting you will also passively be sent the attached gif and will spin-fade out of existence
-You’re also roleblock immune, and will spin-fade roleblockers out of existence too, along with them being sent the gif.
-Also the last person to vote you if you are hanged will spin fade out of existence instantly, along with having the gif posted in public chat
-The first time someone attempts to use a day ability on you, it will fail and you will spin-fade them out of existence and your role will be revealed. The first person to vote you that day will spin-fade out of existence

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value: -If anyone says the word “Pretzels” on day 1 you fucking explode and this cannot be stopped. You die instantly and lose

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Spin-fade everyone out of existence. Only Giles Corey shall exist
